title: [BUG] System.TypeInitializationException : The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception.
body:
**Description**

System.TypeInitializationException : The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception.
System.DllNotFoundException : Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp': The specified module could not be found.

**Code**

We have created a .Net Framework test project referencing the .Net Standard library where the Library has "SkiaSharp" as one of its dependency package. While running the test project, we are facing the above mentioned exception.   

**Expected Behavior**

There should not be any exception

**Actual Behavior**

The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception occurs

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  <1.59.3>
- Last known good version:  <1.59.3>
- IDE:  <!-- Visual Studio 2017
[Test project.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/3916919/Test.project.zip)
 -->
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!.Windows -->
 
- Target Devices:  
  - 
  - 

**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

<!-- please upload or provide a link to a reproduction case -->
